content: *pattern is only available from web archive org* this pattern page is a part of the crochet for every room collection this one is in the teen room section color-me-crazy crochet materials bernat satin 100 g/3 5 oz pillow a main color mc 04605 sunset 3 balls contrast a 04013 mocha 1 ball pillow b contrast a 04732 maitai 3 balls contrast b 04013 mocha 1 ball pillow c main color mc 04605 sunset 2 balls contrast a 04013 mocha 1 ball pillow d main color mc 04605 sunset 1 ball contrast a 04013 mocha 3 balls size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook pillow form 18 ins \ 45 5cm square for each pillow
